#summary To download the library, visit the Source Checkout page and use the svn command shown.

= Downloading the Library =

To download the library, visit the [http://code.google.com/p/google-api-objectivec-client/source/checkout Source Checkout] page and use the *svn* command shown in the Mac's terminal window.

== Updating to the Latest Sources ==

To update your copy of the library to the latest (top-of-trunk) sources, in the Mac's terminal window, use the *cd* command to set the terminal to the directory containing the library, then type *svn update*
